TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit InstallException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 安裝的認可、復原或解除安裝階段發生錯誤時所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the commit, rollback, or uninstall phase of an installation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例中，再加上中的範例建構函式，共同組成的範例顯示有個組件本身的安裝程式。The following example, plus the examples in the constructors, together make up an example showing an assembly having its own installer. 安裝程式名為`MyInstaller`，其中包含屬性`RunInstallerAttribute`，表示此安裝程式會叫用[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。The installer is named `MyInstaller`, which has an attribute `RunInstallerAttribute`, indicating that this installer will be invoked by [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md). [Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)呼叫的方法， ，和。[Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md) calls the methods , , and . 中的程式碼假設名為的檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在之前安裝的組件才能認可。The code in presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed. 如果檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，引發。If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, raises an . 這也跟中的解除安裝，才會如果名為`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在。The same is the case with in which an uninstallation will only happen if a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists. 否則，便會產生。Otherwise it raises an . 在 ，執行程式碼片段時，這可能會引發例外狀況。In , a code fragment is executed, which might raise an exception. 如果引發了例外狀況，它會攔截到和引發例外狀況一併傳遞給它。If the exception is raised, it is caught and an is raised with that exception being passed to it. > [!NOTE] > 執行此範例使用 Installutil.exe 的說明。Run this example with the help of Installutil.exe. 在命令提示字元中輸入：Type this in the command prompt: `Installutil InstallException.exe` -或--or- `Installutil /u InstallException.exe` [!code-cpp[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/CPP/installexception.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/CS/installexception.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallException/VB/installexception.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範建構函式。The following example demonstrates the constructor. 就此範例的一部分類別。It is a part of the example of the class. 在此範例中，呼叫 Installutil.exe方法。In this example, Installutil.exe calls the method. 中的程式碼假設名為的檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在之前安裝的組件才能認可。The code in presumes that a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists before the installation of the assembly can be committed. 如果檔案`FileDoesNotExist.txt`不存在，引發。If the file `FileDoesNotExist.txt` does not exist, raises an . > [!NOTE] > 此範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本建構函式。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範建構函式。The following example demonstrates the constructor. 就此範例的一部分類別。It is a part of the example of the class. 在此範例中，呼叫 Installutil.exe方法。In this example, Installutil.exe calls the method. 如果名為的檔案，只會發生解除安裝`FileDoesNotExist.txt`存在。Uninstallation will only happen if a file named `FileDoesNotExist.txt` exists. 否則，便會產生。Otherwise it raises an . > [!NOTE] > 此範例示範如何使用其中一個多載版本建構函式。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 如需可能會提供其他範例，請參閱個別的多載的主題。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

param.name: message
param.span: 要顯示給使用者的訊息。

span.span: The message to display to the user.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，指定對使用者顯示的訊息以及造成這個例外狀況的內部例外狀況參考。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and specifies the message to display to the user, and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
